# Normal random variable 
```{r cars}
x <- rnorm(1000) 
hist(x, breaks=30, col="lightblue")
```

# Binomial process 
```{r cars}
x <- rbinom(1000, 1, 0.5) # 10 binomials, 1 coin to toss, 0.5 chance for either option
hist(x, breaks=30, col="lightblue")
```

Toss 3 coins 
```{r cars}
x <- rbinom(10000, 25, 0.5)
hist(x, breaks=60, col="lightblue")
```
# Pareto 
```{r}
x <- VGAM::rpareto(100, shape=100)
hist(x, breaks=30, col="lightblue")

```
```{r}
R <- 10000  # how many experiments (repetitions)
means <- numeric(R)  # empty vector for means
for(i in 1:R) {
   x <- VGAM::rpareto(1000, shape=10)
   means[i] <- mean(x)
}
hist(means, breaks=100, col="lightblue")
```
